config.useDevIcons:description: Use vim dev-icons in UI elements / airline etc.
config.supportsDoubleWide:description: Whether or not this version of Vim supports double wide glyph rendering
config.tabSystem:description: Style of Window/Split/Tab management to use.

tabSystem:possibleValues.description: Places airline at the top of the screen, file navigation on left, and tags at the bottom of each split
